summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 12th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to West Dravus Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8676 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
